item.description:
For the Hadoop users: a very interesting and informative webinar coming up:

High Performance Analytics for Deeper Customer Insights!

This webinar might help Hadoop users in finding out how technologies like Hadoop and MapReduce can provide competitive edge to data driven companies.

Impetus Technologies and Aster Data bring an interesting webinar ?A Look under the Hood: High Performance Analytics for Deeper Customer Insights? on Apr 29, 2010 (11 a.m.PT / 2 p.m. ET)

Visit: http://www.impetus.co...
item.name: High Performance Analytics through Hadoop and MapReduce!
